h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 13\. Get Permanent Upgrades with Celestial Medicines
content: Celestial Medicines give permanent boosts to different stats, such as health, mana, stamina, and even certain Bane resistances. You consume Mind Cores to create these medicines, but can refund all of them at any time. You must return to Xu Dog every time you want to either create Celestial Medicines, or refund your Mind Cores.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '13\. Get Permanent Upgrades with Celestial Medicines'.
The content is as follows:
Celestial Medicines give permanent boosts to different stats, such as health, mana, stamina, and even certain Bane resistances. You consume Mind Cores to create these medicines, but can refund all of them at any time. You must return to Xu Dog every time you want to either create Celestial Medicines, or refund your Mind Cores.
